Content:
What are the things you love about a motorcycle whether it be yours, one you used to have or would like to have.

Also, what the the things you love about a motorcycle whether it be yours, one you used to have or would like to have.

NOTE: This is NOT about which "brand" or "model" you love or hate but specs, accessories, size, colour, etc. We don't want to turn this thread into a hateful tirade and trashing other's choices.

To start it off, I love touring and cruiser bikes with lots of quiet power.

I don't like riding bikes without a windshield.
